input.sentences: there was a makeshift map that pointed us in the direction we were to go .
we walked along the river to get there .
beyond the river there was a large city .
we saw the small steeple once we got over the hill .
a plaque on the door told us that we were in the right place .
output.sentences: We studied the map before we headed off for our hike.
As we walked up the hill we were able to view the whole town below.
At the top of the hill was a steeple.
The steeple had a plaque on the door explaining why it was there.
